programme.desc: When a nose accidentally breaks off one of the faces on Hero Hill, our heroes must figure out how to repair the monument. Sparks' Crew tries to help change a broken wheel on a hot dog cart, so they learn how to life a heavy object using a lever.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: When George helps out as a delivery monkey for Chef P., he must learn how to keep hot food from losing its heat. It's the day of Mr. Quint's Pirate Party, and George receives an unmarked box in the mail.

programme.title: Elinor Wonders Why
programme.desc: The kids are making a storybook when they run out of paper, so the kids wonder: where can they get more? This question brings them to Mr. Beaver's paper mill, where they learn that paper comes from trees, and the trees come from? a tree farm.

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: The princess is under a magic sleeping spell and the spell can only be broken if the Prince writes his name on a magic tablet. Elmo and Abby help Prince Billy practice and encourages him to keep trying until he learns how to write his name all by himself.
